definition.text: I'll give you a few pointers on how to edit the page! Right-click on a paragraph to get the styles menu. The pencil starts edit mode...

paragraphs.text: This is an H1... H2 is smaller!
Ab|: creates bullet lists like this one!
The fourth column features notes (like this one), along with tips, important, and warning boxes.
Use JS to add code === "styled by prism!"
Abc| turns the paragraph back to plain text. That should be enough to make your review look great! I'll explain the rest of the menu at a later time!
